typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(uint64 => struct ChallengeLib.Challenge storage ref[] storage ref)
struct ChallengeLib.Challenge storage ref[] storage ref
function (struct ChallengeLib.Challenge storage ref[] storage pointer,bytes32) view returns (int256)
mapping(uint64 => struct ChallengeLib.Challenge storage ref[] storage ref)
struct ChallengeLib.Challenge storage ref[] storage ref

challengeBefore(uint64,bytes,bytes,bytes.details: Submits proof of a transaction before prevTx as an exit challenge

params.signature: The signature of the txBytes by the coin        owner indicated in prevTx
params.slot: The slot corresponding to the coin whose exit is being challenged
params.txBytes: The RLP-encoded transaction involving a particular        coin which an exiting owner of the coin claims to be the latest

finalizeExit(uint64).details: Finalizes an exit, i.e. puts the exiting coin into the EXITED      state which will allow it to be withdrawn, provided the exit has      matured and has not been successfully challenged

finalizeExits(uint64[]).details: Iterates through all of the initiated exits and finalizes those      which have matured without being successfully challenged

respondChallengeBefore(uint64,bytes32,ui.details: Submits proof of a later transaction that corresponds to a challenge

params.challengingTxHash: The hash of the transaction        corresponding to the challenge we're responding to
params.respondingBlockNumber: The block number which included the transaction        we are responding with
params.respondingTransaction: The RLP-encoded transaction involving a particular        coin which took place directly after challengingTransaction
params.signature: The signature which proves a direct spend from the challenger
params.slot: The slot corresponding to the coin whose exit is being challenged

submitBlock(uint256,bytes32).details: called by a Validator to append a Plasma block to the Plasma chain

params.root: The transaction root hash of the Plasma block being added

withdraw(uint64).details: Withdraw a UTXO that has been exited

params.slot: The slot of the coin being withdrawn

challengeBefore(uint64,bytes,bytes,bytes.notice: Exitor has to call respondChallengeBefore and submit a         transaction before prevTx or prevTx itself.

respondChallengeBefore(uint64,bytes32,ui.notice: Can only be called in the second window of the exit period.
